title: Support ticket
body: I sent in a support ticket on Thursday. It's been three days and still not even a peep from riot. To be honest, I'm pretty pissed.

replies.body:
As *Hyperion* mentioned, there can be delays due to a high volume of tickets being created, which there definitely have been due to the recent events going on. One of our specialists will reach out to you in your ticket as soon as possible.

Let me know if you have any questions.
how many rioters actually do anything to fix anything all i see is 3 peoples replying to other peoples things
Please be patient, it can happen when there are more requests than usual. Posting on the boards won't change anything. The most important is to not create another ticket nor bumping the existing one.
